Human Boring About Feed

366 Days

01 Jan 2016

Today is the first day of the new year. My resolution to myself was to be more active on my blog, since I went through all the trouble of getting it up and running. However, I’m not somebody to whom being active online comes easy.

The solution came when I was browsing the web, as it so often does. I stumbled across the Pic: 366 site, where people are encouraged to post one photo per day of 2016 online. For me, this website will be my location. 1/366 - View from my old bedroom in my parent’s house.
